content.rendered:
[vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »grid » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » z_index= » » css= ».vc_custom_1513245107011{margin-top: 30px !important;} »][vc_column][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1512644354680{padding-top: 50px !important;} »]

Support us

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type= »small » position= »center » color= »#00a0e3″][vc_column_text]

Every child deserves a chance to succeed in life. With your support, Break Poverty Foundation can work towards making this happen. Join us!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »grid » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » background_color= »#f8f8f8″ padding_top= »90″ padding_bottom= »90″ z_index= » » css= ».vc_custom_1513196714026{padding-bottom: 10px !important;} »][vc_column width= »1/2″][vc_single_image image= »26602″ img_size= »full » alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= »element_from_left » transition_delay= »0.2″][/vc_column][vc_column width= »1/2″][vc_column_text]

Making a donation

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type= »small » position= »left » color= »#00a0e3″ up= »8″ down= »20″][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1526551283484{padding-bottom: 15px !important;} »]In addition to financial donations, Break Poverty Foundation can receive donations of real estate and moveable assets.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1513195808917{padding-bottom: 15px !important;} »]The donation allows you to irrevocably transmit an asset during your lifetime. In order to validate this transfer, a deed is absolutely necessary.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1526551314776{padding-bottom: 15px !important;} »]This is an efficient way of supporting our foundation today by supplying important resources that are indispensable to the actions led. Your donation is entirely exempt from the transfer taxes. The notarial fees can be covered by the foundation.[/vc_column_text]

Your donation can be one or more assets of real estate as well as a financial amount, shares even a work of art.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »grid » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » css= ».vc_custom_1513249164055{padding-top: 20px !important;} » z_index= » »][vc_column][vc_zigzag color= »custom » custom_color= »#00a0e3″ css= ».vc_custom_1513245394264{padding-top: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;} »][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »grid » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » padding_top= »90″ padding_bottom= »0″ z_index= » »][vc_column width= »1/2″][vc_column_text]

MAKE A TEMPORARY USUFRUCT DONATION

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator type= »small » position= »left » color= »#00a0e3″ up= »8″ down= »20″][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1526551367597{padding-bottom: 15px !important;} »]It is possible to donate an asset whilst retaining its ownership, and to give for a previously determined amount of time, the usufruct of the asset. This is a temporary usufruct donation.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1526551380068{padding-bottom: 15px !important;} »]The temporary usufruct donation includes all types of assets that generate revenues, whether it is an investment portfolio or a rented property. This donation means that the donor will temporarily stop receiving the revenues generated by this asset for Break Poverty Foundation to benefit from it[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1513196233799{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;} »]

Tax benefits

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1526551418407{padding-bottom: 15px !important;} »]The principal advantage of this donation is that it allows you to remove the asset and the revenues generated by it from your tax declaration for a determined amount of time.

In other words, during the time of the donation, the value of the assets produced in usufruct are excluded from the your taxable base and teh revenues become free of tax. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width= »1/2″][vc_single_image image= »26559″ img_size= »full » alignment= »center » qode_css_animation= »element_from_right » transition_delay= »0.4″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »grid » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » css= ».vc_custom_1513249157143{padding-bottom: 50px !important;} » z_index= » »][vc_column][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1526551471116{padding-bottom: 15px !important;} »]The temporary usufruct donation presents another advantage regarding the determined length of time of the donation which is three years minimum. The donor is thus guaranteed to be able to retrieve the full property or asset once the deadline has arrived without paying duty.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1513245325190{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 40px !important;} »]

  • When an investment portfolio is donated under the temporary usufruct donation, Break Poverty Foundation will acquire the revenues produced by the shares.
  • When a rented property is donated under the temporary usufruct donation, Break Poverty Foundation will acquire the entirety of the rents payed.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1513196181947{padding-bottom: 15px !important;} »]It is through this usufruct donation that your assets can contribute to helping the children most in need.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1526551494520{padding-bottom: 15px !important;} »]Your donation will be exempted from any taxes free of cost. It will also be exempted from any taxing of your financial or land revenues.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css= ».vc_custom_1627658148659{padding-bottom: 15px !important;} »]

 

Credits : Mr Exen, shutterstock, Michael Mims, Andrew Coop, Unsplash.

 

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation= » » row_type= »row » use_row_as_full_screen_section= »no » type= »full_width » angled_section= »no » text_align= »left » background_image_as_pattern= »without_pattern » z_index= » »][vc_column]

Pour plus d’information, n’hésitez pas à nous contacter
Nous contacter
[/vc_column][/vc_row]

With your support, Break Poverty Foundation can work towards making this happen. Join us! [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row…
